backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with stubbed level completion, badge checks, and progress queries using temporary in-memory placeholders.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files and components for the memory game.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short manual summaries of all frontend project files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme color tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx with metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the app in a React Query provider and renders the MemoryGameView with notifications.
frontend/src/features/memory-game/Memory: Renders an individual flip card with front/back faces, animations, and click handling.
Main UI managing game levels, timer, card display, custom card backs, authentication, progress saving, and badge minting.
Defines core game types including Card, Level, and level difficulty configs for pairs and grid layout.
frontend/src/features/memory-game/useCar: Hook for selecting, previewing, validating, persisting, and resetting a custom card-back image.
frontend/src/features/memory-game/useMem: Custom hook managing memory game state, card flipping logic, match checking, and game reset.
frontend/src/features/memory-game/usePro: Tracks user progress via backend actor, including completed levels, badge status, and provides mutations to update them.
frontend/src/features/memory-game/useTim: Provides a simple timer with start, stop, reset, and formatted time output.
Generates shuffled emoji card decks based on difficulty and exposes shuffle and grid utility helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables plus flip-card animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a class name merging helper using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, plugins, extended utilities, and dark mode settings.
project_state.json: JSON describing current and planned features for a memory card game, including expansion to 10 levels, progression UX, backend persistence, and a mintable completion badge. It also lists existing features, new requests, and required image assets.
